SELECT EMPLOYEES."EMPLOYEE_ID" AS "employeeId", EMPLOYEES."FIRST_NAME" AS "firstName", EMPLOYEES."LAST_NAME" AS "lastName", EMPLOYEES."EMAIL" AS "email", EMPLOYEES."PHONE_NUMBER" AS "phoneNumber", EMPLOYEES."HIRE_DATE" AS "hireDate", EMPLOYEES."JOB_ID" AS "jobId", EMPLOYEES."SALARY" AS "salary", EMPLOYEES."COMMISSION_PCT" AS "commissionPct", EMPLOYEES."MANAGER_ID" AS "managerId", EMPLOYEES."DEPARTMENT_ID" AS "departmentId", DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS "departmentName" FROM "HR"."EMPLOYEES" join hr.DEPARTMENTS on( EMPLOYEES.DEPARTMENT_ID = departments.DEPARTMENT_ID) ORDER BY EMPLOYEES.DEPARTMENT_ID
